kulami.gui

Class TileComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • kulami.gui.TileComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

     class TileComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    A TileComponent is a JComponent that displays one of 100 fields of a Kulami board.
    Author:
    gordon
